overview:
Currently the Vice President of Global Sales & Partnerships for AVG Technologies (NYSE: AVG). Responsible for the development, distribution and monetization of the AVG toolbar, installer and search products.

Co-founded Visionize a highly profitable company that was acquired by AVG Technologies in June 2011 after less than 22 months of operations. Visionize was one of the leading toolbar companies on the web with over 30 million installs, 18 million unique users a month and the owner of one of the top 900 worldwide most popular sites in the world (Alexa).

Co-founded iMedix, the owner of the award winning website iMedix.com and a platform for healthcare publisher solutions on the web. The iMedix platform allows numerous health publishers around the world to increase revenues, repeat visits, content, pageviews and brand loyalty.

Formerly, established and led Metacafe’s online marketing activities to position it as one of the world’s largest video sites, attracting more than 40 million unique viewers each month (comScore Media Metrix) watching 500+ million page views per month.

Prior to that, supervised the creative content and business partnerships department for Pelephone communications Ltd - Israel’s pioneer mobile operator - 2.7M subscribers & $1.4B revenues. Increased revenues from content and services to a record of $12MM, turning the company to profitability and placing the mobile content division as one of the top growth engines of the entire company ever since.

Formerly, managed the marketing and business development for the A.F.D group, a Washington DC based private investment company of entertainment ventures.

Prior to that, lead various cross-platform marketing activities for AOL Time Warner (NYC Time Warner Cable) and directed new advertising applications projects for McDonald’s, Pepsi and Sony on behalf of MVT Inc.

Served 3 years in the Israeli Defense Forces as a combat soldier in the Golani commando Reconnaissance Platoon and later on as a budget officer. Received his BBA with honors from Baruch College, City University of New York.
